Title: Relates to the offense of assault in the second degree and employees of domestic violence shelters and persons seeking shelter in such shelters
Summary: Expands the offense of assault in the second degree to include the infliction of physical injury to employees of domestic violence shelters and persons seeking shelter in such shelters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to expanding the offense of assault in the second degree to include the infliction of physical injury to employees of domestic violence shelters and persons seeking shelter in such shelters
